findings.rationale: An indefinite term may expose the Receiving Party to perpetual liability for information they may no longer control or remember, leading to potential legal complications.
findings.evidence_quote: This Agreement shall remain in effect indefinitely and shall survive termination of any business relationship between the parties.

findings.rationale: The broad definition of Confidential Information could lead to disputes about what is considered confidential, possibly resulting in unintended disclosures.
findings.evidence_quote: Confidential Information means all non-public, proprietary or confidential information disclosed by the Disclosing Party to the Receiving Party.

findings.rationale: The requirement to return all Confidential Information upon termination may create challenges in compliance, especially if the Receiving Party has integrated the information into their systems.
findings.evidence_quote: Upon termination, the Receiving Party shall return all Confidential Information to the Disclosing Party.
